head_data.title: On August 28-29 we invite you to OdessaJS - an annual Reunion of JavaScript Community

callpappers_data.title: Summer. Sea. JavaScript.
callpappers_data.description:
Enjoy Odessa together with 500+ international participants and share your knowledge with the community.

Welcome to submit your talk and get ready for 2 days of endless fun and be one of the 20+ speakers of the greatest summer Ukrainian JS gatheringðŸ˜Š

firstSlide.title:
**Save the Date: on August 28-29th**



OdessaJS 2021 is our 9th Annual JavaScript community gathering. We've been live since 2013. Letâ€™s meet offline on August 28-29, 2021 in True Man Hot Boat Club.

secondSlide.title:
**Offline Event, August 28-29**

The conference goes outdoor (following all precautions): speeches, workshops, dozens of topics and an afterparty. Get ready to spend your best summer days with tech geeks from different parts of Ukraine.

thirdSlide.title:
**Main&Discussion Stage, August 28-29**

35+ speakers with hands-on reports, actual topics on Discussion stage, Tech Corners and numerous giveaways from our partners - this is not the full list of activities that you need to attend. Stay tuned and plan your conference days.

about_conference_data.text: OdessaJS is an annual meeting of JavaScript community. This year we invite you to join our conference at True Man Hot Boat Club. Conference format - Open Air Seaside Weekend. 35+ speakers, discussions, tech corners and Q&As.
about_conference_data.title: ABOUT ODESSAJS 2021
